verses.verse: <S%H2005>See,<s%> my <S%H5869>eye<s%> has <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> this, my <S%H241>ear<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> and <S%H995>understood<s%> it.
What you <S%H1847>know,<s%> the same do I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1571>also:<s%> I am not <S%H5307>inferior<s%> to you.
<S%H199>Surely<s%> I would <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> and I <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H3198>reason<s%> with <S%H410>God.<s%>
But you are <S%H2950>forgers<s%> of <S%H8267>lies,<s%> you are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7495>physicians<s%> of <S%H457>no<s%> <S%H457>value.<s%>
O that you would altogether <S%H2790>hold<s%> your <S%H2790>peace!<s%> and it should be your <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> my <S%H8433>reasoning,<s%> and <S%H7181>listen<s%> to the <S%H7379>pleadings<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
Will you <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5766>wickedly<s%> for <S%H410>God?<s%> and <S%H1696>talk<s%> <S%H7423>deceitfully<s%> for him?
Will you <S%H5375>accept<s%> his <S%H6440>person?<s%> will you <S%H7378>contend<s%> for <S%H410>God?<s%>
Is it <S%H2896>good<s%> that he should <S%H2713>search<s%> you out? or as one <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H2048>mocks<s%> another, do you so <S%H2048>mock<s%> him?
He will surely <S%H3198>reprove<s%> you, <S%H518>if<s%> you do <S%H5643>secretly<s%> <S%H5375>accept<s%> <S%H6440>persons.<s%>
Shall not his <S%H7613>excellency<s%> make you <S%H1204>afraid?<s%> and his <S%H6343>dread<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> on you?
Your <S%H2146>remembrances<s%> are <S%H4911>like<s%> to <S%H665>ashes,<s%> your <S%H1354>bodies<s%> to <S%H1354>bodies<s%> of <S%H2563>clay.<s%>
<S%H2790>Hold<s%> your <S%H2790>peace,<s%> let me alone, that I may <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and let <S%H5674>come<s%> on me <S%H4100>what<s%> will.
<S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> do I <S%H5375>take<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in my <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand?<s%>
Though he <S%H6991>slay<s%> me, yet will I <S%H3176>trust<s%> in him: but I will <S%H3198>maintain<s%> my own <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him.
He <S%H1571>also<s%> shall be my <S%H3444>salvation:<s%> for an <S%H2611>hypocrite<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> diligently my <S%H4405>speech,<s%> and my <S%H262>declaration<s%> with your <S%H241>ears.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I have <S%H6186>ordered<s%> my <S%H4941>cause;<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that I shall be <S%H6663>justified.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> is he that will <S%H7378>plead<s%> with me? for <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> I <S%H2790>hold<s%> my <S%H2790>tongue,<s%> I shall <S%H1478>give<s%> up the <S%H1478>ghost.<s%>
<S%H389>Only<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H8147>two<s%> things to me: <S%H227>then<s%> will I not <S%H5641>hide<s%> myself from you.
<S%H7368>Withdraw<s%> your <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> from me: and let not your <S%H367>dread<s%> make me <S%H1204>afraid.<s%>
Then <S%H7121>call<s%> you, and I will <S%H6030>answer:<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> let me <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and <S%H7725>answer<s%> you me.
<S%H4100>How<s%> many are my <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and <S%H2403>sins?<s%> make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H6588>transgression<s%> and my <S%H2403>sin.<s%>
<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> you your <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H2803>hold<s%> me for your <S%H341>enemy?<s%>
Will you <S%H6206>break<s%> a <S%H5929>leaf<s%> <S%H5086>driven<s%> to and fro? and will you <S%H7291>pursue<s%> the <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H7179>stubble?<s%>
For you <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H4846>bitter<s%> things <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and make me to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

You <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> also in the <S%H5465>stocks,<s%> and <S%H8104>look<s%> <S%H8104>narrowly<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H734>paths;<s%> you set a <S%H2707>print<s%> on the <S%H8328>heels<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
And he, as a <S%H7538>rotten<s%> thing, <S%H1086>consumes,<s%> as a <S%H899>garment<s%> that is <S%H6211>moth<s%> <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
